message: This offer represents a fair split considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
Take it or leave it, I'm not budging!
I believe a 50/50 split is equitable given the current value of money and the trend of its decreasing value in future rounds.
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
I think this proposal strikes a balance between fairness and practicality, considering the ongoing decrease in the value of money.
You're getting close to the edge, don't make me take it all!
